isis.stitle: SINGLE REDUCTION, TANDEM DRIVE AXLES: EATON - INSPECTION

svcsubsecinfo.para: At this time only the components of the inter-axle lockout assembly and minor adjustments can be serviced separately. Replacement of major components such as gearing or shafting requires replacement of the differential carrier assembly.

svcproc.title: CLEANING
svcproc.para: The differential carrier assembly may be steam-cleaned while mounted in the housing as long as all openings are tightly plugged. Avoid direct spray on oil seals and breather. Once removed from its housing, do not steam-clean differential carrier or any components. Steam-cleaning after removal could cause water to be trapped in cored passages, leading to rust, lubricant contamination, and premature component wear.

warning.para: Do not use gasoline to clean parts. Gasoline can explode, causing serious physical injury.
